stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 3 PAD Campaigns in your deck. click: Place 1 advancement token on a card. You cannot score that card until your next turn begins.
text:
This card costs 0 influence if you have 3 PAD Campaigns in your deck.
[click]: Place 1 advancement token on a card. You cannot score that card until your next turn begins.
title: PAD Factory
